definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
to play tricks on/to make a fool of

sentences.english: A white light flashed, lit the sky in silver.
sentences.chinese: 一道白光閃起，夜空亮起銀輝。

sentences.english: A gun shot suddenly pealed forth and shot its flames into the air.
sentences.chinese: 突然一聲炮響，一道火光升上天空。

sentences.english: They passed the dry bed of a rivulet.
sentences.chinese: 他們跨過了一道乾涸的河牀。

sentences.english: I am not a good painter but I like to daub.
sentences.chinese: 下一道手續是在牆面上塗抹一層沙漿。

sentences.english: However, new trapped emotions could possibly form a new wall.
sentences.chinese: 可是，新的壓抑情緒可能會築造一道新牆。

sentences.english: The staff wanted him to live and prayed with him everyday.
sentences.chinese: 工作人員鼓勵他活下去，並每天與他一道做祈禱。

sentences.english: We found the poster on a partition door in the Villa of the East Garden.
sentences.chinese: 在東園別墅的一道隔扇門上，我們找到了那張捷報。

sentences.english: What is the Battle Between the Dragon and the Tiger?
sentences.chinese: 龍虎鬥是一道什麼樣的菜？

sentences.english: And looking into it, he saw a flight of stone stairs.
sentences.chinese: 向洞內望去，見有一道石級。

sentences.english: My grandparents built a bamboo fence around their house.
sentences.chinese: 我的外公外婆在房子周圍築了一道竹籬。

sentences.english: Fountain where the Devotees of Allah do drink, making it flow in unstinted abundance.
sentences.chinese: 即真主的衆僕所飲的一道泉水，他們將使它大量湧出。

sentences.english: But it's just a matter for her to get through one of those big ones .
sentences.chinese: 但那只是她取得這些成績的過程中的一道坎。

sentences.english: Of course, adding a dessert and a cup of tea or coffee is also another good choice.
sentences.chinese: 味色具佳，最好加上一道甜點，以及茶式咖啡。

sentences.english: Overhead soared Crested Serpent-Eagles and a rainbow load of butterflies in the tree tops.
sentences.chinese: 一道由蝴蝶串成的彩虹就掛在樹梢。

sentences.english: There was a rainbow of light and then they were through the hyper-space barrier.
sentences.chinese: 一道彩虹似的光閃過之後，他們就穿越了超空間壁壘。

definition: (of a meteor etc) to streak across (the sky)/(of a searchlight, lightning etc) to play across (the sky)
to smell, look and taste great
dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor
(of a perfume or a foul odor) permeating the whole place/(of grease etc) dripping everywhere/flowing all over the place
dish consisting of stir-fried potato, eggplant and green pepper
